column5: I had a couple great hours this afternoon ice fishing with my 18mo old GrDauter. I think she's gonna be a natural.        Simon I will be watching out for your Jack in about 16 yrs.
Looks like a great day!! Good job!
My wife is due for our first Sept 3rd!  I hope at 18 months, my wife will let me take the youngin on the ice.  Not likely though..  Good to see you had a great time with the Grand Daughter.!
That's awesome Blue Lk    You have the perfect partner
What a great shot with the dog standing guard!!! Reminds me of our old Lab that did the same with kids.. no training required!  She's a keeper... that's for sure!
Great stuff Rick!!  Would that be a Great Pyrenees?  Awesome dogs, had one up until about 12 years ago.
She's a keeper!  I remember taking my 2 daughters on the ice when they were 8 & 10.  They're now 38 and 35.  Memories is what its all about.
LOL!!!  Looks like you had a great day with your granddaughter!   TDunn
Hijack the child, sneak her out of school, take her out often and spoil her rotten   looks like she had a fun time, and sounds like Gramps is prouder than a peacock.
Awesome Rick!  Cutie for sure! The minnow bucket is also a non stop source of entertainment for Jack too.  I think Jack will have to be careful of her, she looks taller than him already!!!!
That way she'll keep Jack in line
